short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Chrome Extension to simplify SEO Specialists Tasks with automated features for analysis, reporting, and data extraction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SEO Specialist Tasks extension for Google Chrome is designed to streamline your SEO workflow by providing quick access to essential website and SERP data directly from your browser. This powerful tool is perfect for SEO professionals and webmasters looking to optimize their sites and monitor their search engine presence more efficiently.

From a webpage, you can extract:

> Title Tag: Quickly view the meta title of the current page.
> Meta Description: Easily access the meta description to evaluate or copy.
> Meta Robots: Check the robots meta tag to understand indexing directives.
> Canonical: Identify the canonical link element of the page.
> Header Structure (H1-H6): Analyze the structure of headings for SEO optimization.
> Images: Review associated domains, attributes, URLs, and identify images without alt-text.
> Internal Links and Anchor Text: Get insights into total internal links, relative links, anchor tags without href, empty links, and trailing '#'.
> Word Count: Determine the total word count of the page for content analysis.

From the SERP, you can now extract:

 > Organic Results: With a single click, extract and display the URLs, title tags & meta descriptions of organic search results in the SERP, making it easier to analyze the competition and keyword relevance.

 > People Also Ask: Explore questions and links from the "People Also Ask" section.
-Related Search: Extract related searched queries for broader insights.

##Fixed: Fixed the extraction of "Related Search" or "People also search for" queries##

### NEW ###

> Infinite Scroll for SERP: New functionality that allows you to enable infinite scrolling on the SERP, so you can view more results seamlessly without clicking on pagination.

> Auto-click Functionality: Activate the checkbox and click on any button to start auto-clicking. Simply uncheck the checkbox to stop the auto-clicking process.

The SEO Specialist Tasks extension is your go-to tool for making SEO analysis and data extraction simpler and more accessible. Enhance your SEO efforts by installing the extension today and take the first step towards more efficient and effective search engine optimization.
